util

Class AnnotationFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.AnnotationFinder

  • public class AnnotationFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to find Annotations based on their runtime class.

      <T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>>      		 find(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation)
      Find annotations in classpath The class needs to have @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME) for it to be found.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public <T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> find(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation)
        Find annotations in classpath The class needs to have @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME) for it to be found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of annotation
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation class to look for
        See Also:
        ScreenFinder, MVC
